titleStmt.title: A letter from a gentleman to his friend Concerning the second edition of the declaration against Antinomian errors, &c. lately published by Geo. Griffith, Matthew Mead, Stev. Lobb, Richard Taylor, John Nesbitt.
titleStmt.author: Gentleman in the city.

titleStmt.title: A letter from a gentleman to his friend Concerning the second edition of the declaration against Antinomian errors, &c. lately published by Geo. Griffith, Matthew Mead, Stev. Lobb, Richard Taylor, John Nesbitt.
titleStmt.author: Gentleman in the city.

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 3 reads: A letter from a gentleman in the City to his friend.
Title words "Geo. .. Lobb," and "Richard .. Nesbitt." are joined by right and left braces respectively.
"A Declaration of the Congregational ministers, in and about London, against Antinomian errours" was published in 1699.
Copy stained on title page and final page, affecting legibility.
Reproduction of the original in Dr. Williams' Library, London, England.
